00004 array2D createTreeStructure2D(size_t m1, size_t m2, double* data) {
00005   int j1;
00006   array2D A = (array2D) malloc( sizeof(array1D) * m1);
00007   A[0] = data;
00008   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00009     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00010   }
00011 
00012   return A;
00013 }

00016 array3D createTreeStructure3D(size_t m1, size_t m2, size_t m3, double* data) {
00017   int j1,j2;
00018   array3D A = (array3D) malloc( sizeof(array2D) * m1);
00019   A[0] = createTreeStructure2D(m1*m2, m3, data);
00020   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00021     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00022   }
00023   return A;
00024 }

00026 array4D createTreeStructure4D(size_t m1, size_t m2, size_t m3, size_t m4, double* data) {
00027   int j1,j2;
00028   array4D A = (array4D) malloc( sizeof(array3D) * m1);
00029   A[0] = createTreeStructure3D(m1*m2,m3,m4,data);  
00030   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00031     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00032   }
00033   return A;
00034 }

00039   }

00045     free(A);

00058 array1D createArray1D(size_t m1) {
00059 #ifndef INIT_ARRAYS_WITH_ZERO
00060   array1D A = (array1D) malloc( sizeof(array_t) * m1);
00061 #else
00062   array1D A = (array1D) calloc(m1,sizeof(array_t));
00063 #endif
00064   return A;
00065 }

00068 array2D createArray2D(size_t m1, size_t m2) {
00069   int j1;
00070   array2D A = (array2D) malloc( sizeof(array1D) * m1);
00071   A[0]      = createArray1D(m1*m2);
00072   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00073     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00074   }
00075 
00076   return A;
00077 }

00080 array3D createArray3D(size_t m1, size_t m2, size_t m3) {
00081   int j1,j2;
00082   array3D A = (array3D) malloc( sizeof(array2D) * m1);
00083   A[0]      = createArray2D(m1*m2,m3);
00084   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00085     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00086   }

00090 array4D createArray4D(size_t m1, size_t m2, size_t m3, size_t m4) {
00091   int j1,j2;
00092   array4D A = (array4D) malloc( sizeof(array3D) * m1);
00093   A[0]      = createArray3D(m1*m2,m3,m4);
00094   A[0] = createArray3D(m1*m2,m3,m4);  
00095   for (j1=1; j1<m1; ++j1) {
00096     A[j1] = A[j1-1] + m2;
00097   }
00098   return A;
00099 }

00128 void printToFileArray2D(array2D A, int m1, int m2, FILE* file) {
00129     int k1,k2;
00130     
00131      for (k2 = m2-1; k2 > -1; k2--) {
00132         for (k1 = 0; k1 < m1; k1++) {
00133             fprintf(file,"%10.8f ",A[k1][k2]);
00134         }
00135         fprintf(file,"\n");
00136     }
00137 }
